title: Add Google Search Console verification meta tag

requirements.summary: Add the Google Search Console verification meta tag to the main HTML document head.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html contains exactly one <meta name="google-site-verification" ...> tag with content="IjrggOYDYzGbpwqvtFNRgEKp8_g0kCeYhwNJnpSwr60" inside the <head> element.
The application builds successfully and the tag is present in the rendered document <head> when visiting the site.

file_operations.description: Insert <meta name="google-site-verification" content="IjrggOYDYzGbpwqvtFNRgEKp8_g0kCeYhwNJnpSwr60" /> inside the <head> element, ensuring there is exactly one such tag (avoid duplicates) and making no other SEO/third-party additions.
